product_name: Estee LauderPerfectly Clean Multi-Action Foam Cleanser/Purifying Mask
summary: SummaryHighlightsSustainable PackagingTreat your skin with EstÃ©e Lauder's Perfectly Clean Multi-Action Foam Cleanser/Purifying Mask, a refreshing foam that cleanses gently yet thoroughly.
details: DetailsBenefitsThe creamy formula rapidly lathers into a rich foaming cleanser that gently removes makeup and other impurities without dryingUnclogs poresLeaves skin healthy, fresh and luminousUse it 2 ways: Morning and night as a daily cleanser to purify skin - Or twice a week as a 3-minute purifying maskThe Perfectly Clean Collection: EstÃ©e Lauder's proprietary, cleansing technology is combined with natural skin-loving botanicals and minerals for a deep but gentle cleanseIdeal For: Normal/Combination skinGentle daily cleansing2X/Week deep purifyingRefreshing latherItem 2531469How To UseAs your daily cleanser, use AM and PM. Massage gently over wet skin, then rinse off.As a purifying mask, use twice a week or as needed. Massage over dry skin. Wait 3 minutes and rinse. Avoid eye area.IngredientsWater\Aqua\Eau, Hydrogenated Polyisobutene, Isohexadecane, Glycerin, Hexyldecyl Stearate, Squalane, Petrolatum, Glyceryl Stearate, Silybum Marianum (Lady'S Thistle) Extract, Gentiana Lutea (Gentian) Root Extract, Algae Extract, Sorbitol, Caffeine, Isododecane, Sucrose, Hydrogenated Lecithin, Hydrogenated Polydecene, PEG-100 Stearate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Stearyl Alcohol, Ceteareth-20, Carbomer, Dimethicone, Butylene Glycol, Caprylyl Glycol, Zinc Pca, Hexylene Glycol, Fragrance (Parfum), Potassium Hydroxide, Disodium EDTA, Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: As your daily cleanser, use AM and PM. Massage gently over wet skin, then rinse off.As a purifying mask, use twice a week or as needed. Massage over dry skin. Wait 3 minutes and rinse. Avoid eye area.
ingredients: Phenoxyethanol.Please be aware that ingredient lists may change or vary from time to time. Please refer to the ingredient list on the product package you receive for the most up to date list of ingredients

reviews.headline: Best face wash ever!!!
reviews.comments: I love using this in the morning! It makes my face feel super clean. It does feel a little dry right after you pat your face dry, but of course, if you moisturize, you'll be fine. For a combo skin like mine, its perfect!

reviews.headline: Works for oily skin
reviews.comments: Works well on my oily skin. Does not have a strong smell. A little gies a long way. So it lasts forever.

reviews.headline: Outstanding
reviews.comments: This is the best cleanser I have ever used. My skin feels significantly cleaner immediately after I rinse my face. Literally makes my skin squeaky clean and feeling totally purified. My sample of this is almost used up and I'm definitely buying the full size and replacing my other cleansers with this one. My complexion is so much clearer now and my makeup sets much better when I start my day fresh with this. A little goes a long way and the frothy texture feels luxurious. It's also gentle on my sensitive skin. This stuff is the jackpot, I absolutely love it.

reviews.headline: It's okâ€¦ but gave it burning sensation after rinsing
reviews.comments: It cleaned my face really well but gave it burning sensation after rinsing.

reviews.headline: Perfectly clean multi-action foal cleanser
reviews.comments: Way too much fragrance. Every time I used it my face broke out like a teenager. Disappointed. Expected much more from EstÃ©e Lauder

reviews.headline: Luxurious!!!
reviews.comments: Love this.  Smells good.  Lathers supremely.  Feels clean after.

reviews.headline: I really did not like this
reviews.comments: I got this as a test sample and found it really unpleasant.  It has a strong perfumy smell and left my face feeling stripped.  And it was hard to wash off.  I'm glad I got a sample so I know not to buy this.

reviews.headline: Perfect cleanser for my sensitive, combo skin
reviews.comments:
I have used many different brands of cleansers/masks. Generic to luxury high priced. Amidst my journey I stubmped upon this one along the way and have not cheated since. 

Aside from the occasional - hormonal, once a month break outs, this cleansing mask has done the job time and time again. My skin is sensetive to fragrance and abrasion. This silky smooth texture lathers perfectly onto my skin and goes to work instantly. I like to leave it lathered on my skin while brushing my teeth. Its a greak mask and cleanser all in one. 

Estee lauder has an exfoliator ("perfectly clean multi-action cleansing gele/refiner") that I love to use 2-3 times a week. It lightly exfoliates and preps the skin for the cleansing mask. My skin never feels dried out after using these products. I would recomend to anybody that has normal to combo skin.

reviews.headline: Perfect cleanser for my sensitive, combo skin
reviews.comments:
I have used many different brands of cleansers/masks. Generic to luxury high priced. Amidst my journey I stubmped upon this one along the way and have not cheated since. 

Aside from the occasional - hormonal, once a month break outs, this cleansing mask has done the job time and time again. My skin is sensetive to fragrance and abrasion. This silky smooth texture lathers perfectly onto my skin and goes to work instantly. I like to leave it lathered on my skin while brushing my teeth. Its a greak mask and cleanser all in one. 

Estee lauder has an exfoliator ("perfectly clean multi-action cleansing gele/refiner") that I love to use 2-3 times a week. It lightly exfoliates and preps the skin for the cleansing mask. My skin never feels dried out after using these products. I would recomend to anybody that has normal to combo skin.

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS FACE WASH FOR MY OILY COMBINATION GIRLIES!
reviews.comments: This face wash will leave your face feeling super clean! It foams up so amazingly!

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS FACE WASH FOR MY OILY COMBINATION GIRLIES!
reviews.comments: This face wash will leave your face feeling super clean! It foams up so amazingly!

reviews.headline: LOVE THIS
reviews.comments: I got a sample of this from my mom, and I loved it so much I splurged on the full size one.  I have pretty dry skin and this is the only cleanser that leaves my skin feeling clean, fresh, and doesn't dry it out.  It's so soft to use, I find it almost therapeutic.

reviews.headline: Love this!
reviews.comments: I absolutely love this product and wish it were still available in my local Ulta store.  I love the way it cleanses my skin without drying it out.  A little goes a long way.

reviews.headline: I want to love this, but
reviews.comments: The fragrance is holding me back for giving this 5 stars. There's a lot of great things going on here. It foams up beautifully and it feels like a dream when used as a cleanser. The effectiveness of this as a mask almost knocked me off my feet. I did as instructed and applied to dry skin for 3 minutes. When washed it off my pores seemed to have spit up what're was clogging them. I can't say I've ever had such an immediate and positive result with a mask. However, because the fragrance is so strong, I couldn't wait to was this off. It's not an unpleasant scent, I just which I could turn it down about 80%. I got this as a sample and I'm not sure if I'll use it again solely because of the smell. I highly recommend this if strong fragrances don't bother you, but if they do, stay clear!

reviews.headline: Great product!
reviews.comments: The creamy texture feels nice on my face and gently cleans.

reviews.headline: Worth it
reviews.comments: This is the best cleanser out there for me personally. Works well for my oily combo skin. Smells nice.

reviews.headline: broke me out
reviews.comments: this made my skin feel weird and waxy. about a week into using it my face broke out severly.

reviews.headline: Amazing
reviews.comments: This cleanser is amazing. The first time i used it was from some 1oz samples that i had lying around and it cleared my skin immediately! The price may be a bit in the luxury zone for a face wash for a lot of people but this face wash is for "normal skin" however my skin tends to go from dry in winters to oily in summers and this stuff is great for both times. It doesnt strip my skin of its oils at all. I have tried many face washes from drunk elephant, neutrogena stuff, and even glossier. All of those irritate my skin in some way or strip it to where it feels dry and flakey. Not this cleanser though. It cleans while keeping my skin smooth and healthy.

reviews.headline: Not what I expected
reviews.comments: I really wanted to love this face wash but didn't clean my face very well..I still had a ton of makeup left behindðŸ˜«

reviews.headline: I'm not a cleanser expert but...
reviews.comments: I'm not a cleanser expert but this stuff is amazing. My skin has never felt so soft and clean. I have pretty normal skin that's generally clear, and this makes my face feel fantastic.

properties.name: Cons

values.label: burns like acid when accidentally gets in eyes

display_values: burns like acid when accidentally gets in eyes

faceoff_positive.comments: I absolutely love this product! The foam is so luxurious! I only wish my local Ulta still stocked it instead of waiting for it to be delivered. I used to pick it up there but all of a sudden they stopped carrying it in store. I much rather go to Ulta for my products so I can browse all the great beauty finds.
faceoff_positive.headline: Best cleanser ever!!

faceoff_negative.comments:
I tried this cleanser because I use several Estee Lauder products that I really like. 

This cleanser however, has a very strong fragrance. I usually don't mind a slight fragrance in my cleansers, but this is simply too strong. Like, way too strong! 

It also burns the absolute heck out of my eyes if it gets near them. My eyes aren't too sensitive if a gentle cleanser accidentally gets in them, but this product burns like no other!
I do like the feel of cleanliness it delivers and it makes my skin feel squeaky clean. 

Bottom line, if you can stand a cleanser with a bottle of perfume dumped into it and don't mind pouring alcohol in your eyes, then this cleanser is for you!
faceoff_negative.headline: I feel this cleanser is too harsh for delicate skin

rollup.name: Perfectly Clean Multi-Action Foam Cleanser/Purifying Mask
